lyrics:
Ohhh, oh, oh, oh
Thank God for you.  (I thank God, I thank God.)
You were woman enough, (I thank God, I thank God.)
Girl, not to try to hide...(Didn't try to hide it, baby.)
Didn't try to hide your love (Didn't try to hide it, baby.)
For this other guy.  Hey.  (Didn't try to hide it, baby.)
No need to explain

Ohhh, oh, oh.  I thank the angels for you
That you were woman enough to try to make it easier for me
Wherever.  (Try to make it easy, try to make it easy, try to make it easy, try to make it easy.)
Said wherever you go
I want you to know you have but to call on me
And I'll be right by your side

Ohhh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Thank God for you (I thank God, I thank God.)
For it's very nice to see.  (I thank God, I thank God.)
There's a man (So understanding, baby.) who understands
(So understanding, baby.) How hard it is to take your hand
(So understanding, baby.) And try to explain

Ohhh, oh, oh, oh.  Thank the angels for you
You're the kind of man you are to be so understanding
Well...(So understanding, so understanding, so understanding, so understanding.)
Wherever you go, you have but to call on me
I'm gonna be right by your side.  Yes I will
Ohhh, oh, oh, oh
Thank God above, we were able to see
Just how wrong we were
Ain't understanding mellow
(Ain't understanding mellow.  We have this love of ours.)
Ain't understanding mellow
(Ain't understanding mellow.  We have this love of ours.)
Ain't understanding mellow, baby
(Ain't understanding mellow.  We have this love of ours.)
(Ain't understanding mellow.) Oh, when you wake up in the morning, baby
(Ain't understanding mellow.  We have this love of ours.)
(Oh, ain't it mellow.) Oh, mellow, baby
(Ain't understanding mellow.  We have this love of ours.)
(I just can't do without you.) Oh, I never had a love like this, baby
(Ain't understanding mellow...)
